titles.title: A bill to amend the removal and transfer procedures for the Inspectors General of the Library of Congress, the Office of the Architect of the Capitol, and the Government Publishing Office.
Improving the Inspector General Process for Legislative Branch Instrumentalities Act
Improving the Inspector General Process for Legislative Branch Instrumentalities Act
Improving the Inspector General Process for Legislative Branch Instrumentalities Act
Improving the Inspector General Process for Legislative Branch Instrumentalities Act

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Improving the Inspector General Process for Legislative Branch Instrumentalities Act
This bill amends the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 2006 to allow the transfer of the Inspectors General of the Library of Congress, the Office of the Architect of the Capitol, and the Government Publishing Office to another position within, or another location of, the respective entity.
